message: Starting critique - gathering phase handover and task context
Reviewing agent findings and system architecture - examining review spawn mechanism
Reading review spawning code - examining _auto_spawn_phase_reviewers implementation
Analyzing review architecture - compiling senior dev observations on design patterns and implementation quality

CRITIQUE COMPLETE: Reviewed review spawning architecture. VERDICT: Spawning mechanism works perfectly (2 reviewers + 1 critique spawned successfully, proper state transitions). CRITICAL BUG: submit_review_verdict has UnboundLocalError blocking reviewers from submitting verdicts. Minor issues: zombie processes, JSON/SQLite consistency. Submitted 10 observations with architectural praise and urgent fix recommendations.
